reviews.review_msg: Michele is the type of prof that you either get or you don't, she is very eccentric and can seem a bit odd at times, but the foundation of what she is teaching is really good. She is more flexible with upper level classes and will modify the readings and assignments based on our feedback (there was 10 of us in a class)
My favourite prof that I've had so far. Class is fun as long you participate. If you keep up with the readings and attend class there is no reason you can't get a decent grade in his classes

I have taken multiple courses with Professor Cramer and I honestly do not understand why he has negative reviews. He motivates me to further my knowledge and is always a pleasure to listen to in lecture. His focus is on Rhetoric so if you have no interest in the subject you might find his courses difficult. Amazing professor over all though

Even though I have a 3.7 GPA, I still learned so much by taking this course. Peter sometimes takes things a bit slowly, but overall he's a fabulous instructor. He's also a tough marker so be prepared to work hard. But he's enthusiastic when students show interest. He is a very nice person, and also very nice to look at.
